title: Sequoia Translation
hero: Experts in high quality Japanese - English translation, editing and proofreading
text: Experts in high quality Japanese - English translation, editing-proofreading and native checking
servicesText: We specialise in translating, refining and providing native checking for a wide range of business, technical, legal and academic writing.
blockOneText: We provide high quality Japanese-English translations. Each translation is reviewed by a native English speaker and US lawyer with over 25 years of experience working internationally as a general counsel for major global corporations and technology ventures.
blockTwoText: Based on our clientâ€™s needs and requests, we refine and check the accuracy of documents to: + simplify the text to ease understanding + raise the level of professionalism + proofread for proper syntax, spelling, grammar and punctuation.
blockThreeText: Our native checking works to refine and ensure that the English document is written in a manner which clearly, properly and naturally communicates to English readers. If requested, we will adapt the tone and style to suit different types of audiences.
aboutText: David Karl [Add photo] David is a US native and Japanese speaker who has worked for over 20 years as a general counsel for international companies in the United States, Europe and the Middle East. During this time he worked extensively in drafting and supervising the editing of a wide range of commercial, legal and training documents, and in teaching writing skills. Misako Guinn [Add photo] Misako is a native Japanese speaker now based in the UK, with extensive experience in teaching Japanese as a foreign language to English speakers and providing Japanese- English translation services. She has also worked for more than 20 years as a special-needs teacher in the Japanese school system.
blockFiveText: We are a team of professional, native Japanese and English speakers with + a deep understanding of Japanese culture and international business, + years of experience in drafting, editing and producing high quality writing + an absolute committed to delivering top quality services and to building and maintaining the highest levels of client satisfaction and long term trust.
blockSixText: We are always available and ready to respond quickly and effectively to customer questions and requests for refinements.
